alerts.alert_text:
Buses will replace trains between Frankston and Stony Point until last service, Sunday 14 July due to major project works.
This may increase your journey time by up to 60 minutes. Replacement buses are subject to local traffic conditions.

Changes to your service will apply until last service, Wednesday 24 July.
Buses will replace trains between Flinders Street and Moorabbin until last service, Sunday 14 July due to major project works.

Visit our Planned Works webpage to see how your journey may be affected.
Visit the PTV webpage for details of the Winter Construction Blitz and upcoming changes to your service throughout July.

alerts.alert_text:
Buses will replace trains between Flinders Street and Moorabbin until last service, Sunday 14 July due to major project works.
Buses for passengers travelling between Flinders Street and Caulfield will depart from Federation Square.
Buses for passengers travelling between Caulfield and Moorabbin will depart from the Arts Centre.
This may increase your journey time by up to 60 minutes. Replacement buses are subject to local traffic conditions.

Services will run to an altered timetable between Caulfield and Frankston.
All services will not stop at Carrum. A replacement bus service will operate between Seaford and Bonbeach, via Carrum.
Changes to your service will apply until last service, Wednesday 24 July.

Note:

Buses will replace trains between Frankston and Stony Point until last service, Sunday 14 July.

Visit our Planned Works webpage to see how your journey may be affected.
Visit the PTV webpage for details of the Winter Construction Blitz and upcoming changes to your service throughout July.

alerts.alert_text:
Buses will replace trains between Flinders Street and Sandringham until last service, Sunday 14 July due to major project works.
Night Network buses depart from Federation Square (Flinders Street) 10pm to 7am.
At all other times, buses depart from Spring Street (Parliament Station) with both Limited express and Stopping all stations services.
This may increase your journey time by up to 60 minutes. Replacement buses are subject to local traffic conditions.
Visit our Planned Works webpage to see how your journey may be affected.
Visit the PTV webpage for details of the Winter Construction Blitz and upcoming changes to your service throughout July.
